work.title: 3WIS
work.content: This site has an easy and intuitive on-page navigation and beautiful changing color gradings. It's made with WP, Oxygen, and a lot of custom code. Click image to visit.

work.title: A-Leaf
work.content: This site has a lot of custom stuff. The on-page navigation on frontpage easily takes you to the desired area. The available jobs page is connected to an external API and custom built with a WP PHP plugin. Click image to visit.

work.title: Hylling
work.content: Hylling is a company in the energy sector, and covers a lot of different areas. This site aims give the visitor a quick road to the specific area of their interest, all with a modern look easy on the eye. It is also WP Oxygen, and relies heavy on reusable components. Click image to visit.

work.title: Ebeltoft Havnefront
work.content: This Real Estate site is a classic WP Elementor site with a twist. It comes with a custom graphic apartment picker, and a 3D/VR tour of the luxurious apartments. Click image to visit (with a VR headset if you have one).
